name: Azure Dev College Codespace
postCreateCommand: curl -fsSL https://apt.releases.hashicorp.com/gpg | sudo apt-key add - && sudo apt-add-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://apt.releases.hashicorp.com $(lsb_release -cs) main"  && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install terraform && curl -Lo bicep.bin https://github.com/Azure/bicep/releases/latest/download/bicep-linux-x64 && chmod +x ./bicep.bin && mv ./bicep.bin /home/codespace/.local/bin/bicep
